name: Envy Stake Pool
description: ENVY provides excellent staking service to delegators, with zero margin fees. We are two brothers that are currently members of the xSPO and SPA alliances to support small, single pool operators and want to help the Cardano community grow and support decentralization. 10% profits donated to Dave Thomas Foundation for Adoption, which focuses on adoption of foster children. Follow us at @EnvyStakePool on Twitter and www.envystakepool.com for updates and new educational content. Delegate to ENVY to support the decentralization of Cardano.
